{"id":648665921,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1645794758,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/648665921/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"23.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool ispalindrome(string s, int i, int j){\n        while(i < j){\n            if(s[i] == s[j]){\n                i++;\n                j--;\n            }\n            else{\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        int l  = 0;\n        int r = s.size()-1;\n        while(l < r){\n            if(s[l] == s[r]){\n                l++;\n                r--;\n            }\n            else{\n                return ispalindrome(s, l+1, r) || ispalindrome(s, l, r-1);\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
